original_text: The Jordan forms its boundary on the eastern side. This is the inheritance of the people of Benjamin, according to their clans, boundary by boundary all around.
korean_text: 동쪽 경계는 요단이니 이는 베냐민 자손이 그들의 가족대로 받은 기업의 사방 경계였더라

sentences.original_text: The Jordan forms its boundary on the eastern side.
sentences.korean_translation: 요단 강이 그 동쪽 경계가 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: This is the inheritance of the people of Benjamin,
